author: Jarred Logie
comment: The application works beautifully, it was initially confusing to update the information database through the forums (which you don't need to have an account to do so). Got everything I need to check rules and stats of monsters in the free version. I can see that the developer is really committed to make this application one of the best available

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Thank you for the updated review! If you run into any problems just send me an email.

author: Boi Bill
comment: The app is great for what it has. I admit, updating with content from the forum is kind of confusing. I was hoping to add all the feats that are missing, so I downloaded the file that I thought was the correct one. Now, that file sits on my phone, and I'm not sure how to make the app realize it's there. If I could be instructed how to do that, I'd easily give the app 5 stars.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: You can open the file with a filebrowser app or from an email for example and it should show the app as one of the options to open the file with. Send me an email for some detailed instructions at info@vansteinengroentjes.nl .

author: Eric Lambert
comment: The app is alright, but there's a fair amount missing even from the original PHB, like most of the class specializations. It usually only covers 1. Sure, you can go to their forum and add it, as has been recommended repeatedly in previous comments, but you'd think something like that would have been patched into the app itself by now.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Thank you for the review. Unfortunately we are not allowed to directly publish the additional content in the app. The app comes with the complete SRD5 which is an open subset of the official content.

author: Doriard Tyr
comment: I tried registering with the forum, jumped through the hoops for it to tell me that it thinks I am a bot and will not let me register.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Please send an email to info@vansteinengroentjes.nl , I will assist you with the issue. You can download the files without a forum account though, so please review the app instead of the forum here.

author: Patrick Lipp
comment: I don't see an email or anything so leaving a review instead. This is probably a bug, or you pull data from another source (as I saw this on the wikia page for fighter as well), but battle Master and eldritch knight are missing from the fighter. I would also like to see hyperlinks to other sections. So, for example, I see a reference to another section of the phb and I can navigate there quickly. Ie, I see the word spells it takes me to the spells section. I am interested in the character manager, but would like to try before I buy. A short timed demo would be nice within the app. Otherwise, it looks pretty good!

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Thank you for the review. You can find a lot of additional content on our forums at complete-reference.com/forum/ . From there you can easily import the content in the app. Some of the content has interlinking (like spells in monster stats) but this can indeed be increased. Please mail to  info@vansteinengroentjes.nl for the trial.

author: Taha Khan
comment: I like the app it pretty much has everything you would need. My only suggestion if you guys would make a filter for the random encounter. For example let us choose the the type of monsters the pc will encounter.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Good suggestion! I could make a the monster family a filter, for example like humanoids, aberrations etc. I will keep it in mind for the next version and probably implement it.

author: Joshua Hamel
comment: Really helpful app, with lots of great downloadable content! One suggestion I'd like to see implemented is the ability to input fractional CR's for homebrew monsters, as it appears there is currently no way to assign a CR between 0 and 1.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback! That is indeed correct, you can specify it in the text but not in the field. I will keep it in mind for next release.

author: johnathan harbeck
comment: While it would be nice to not have to pay for everything, the free side is still quite nice and definitely helpful. Also updates regularly, which is good to know. 4.8 rounded up.

author: Ruben Otero
comment: Now that I am playing non-spellcaster this app is great.. I don't like the UI, but the content is what matters the most! Thanks!

author: Misty Betz
comment: I am loving the app.  It has everything I was looking for, including the ability to add content and print information out.   Unfortunately, when I tried to register for the forum, it wouldn't let me, so I cannot download anything.  There does not seem to be a way to contact anyone about this issue without being registered.  If that was better, I would give it a higher rating.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: You can contact me directly by email at info@vansteinengroentjes.nl, I can give you a temporary password if the forum registration for some reason fails. You do not need a forum account though to download the additional content, just go to the content thread and download the files. Hope that helps, let me know if you need help.

author: Blarrg
comment: Free version is alright. Don't buy the character sheet IAP. Very barebones, hardly any auto calculation. Disappointing

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: We are working on that. Auto calculations are not easy with the custom content. But thanks for the review!

author: Rich Ostorero
comment: Nice app for the DnD player or DM. Functional but not slick or pretty. The ability to add content is a big deal. Would like to see the ability to remove a character from the creator app. Otherwise rate a 5.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: You can delete a character from the Android app by going to the character and then pressing the upper right menu. It should give you the option to delete the character. In the online character manager you can do this by selecting the character and then the red delete button. Let me know if you have any other issue. You can also reach us by email.

author: Chris Griffiths
comment: UI awful. Barely any useful info in there

author: Christian Patterson
comment: I use this all the time as a DM tool. For those features, this app is fantastic. I don't like that I have to make multiple purchases to get all the content, so I use other apps to fill in the blanks.

author: Cow Harris
comment: Great app but missing some of the newer races. The race if the aasimar is unavailable

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Check our forum at complete-reference.com/forum/ . You can download and import a lot of content from there including the newer races.

author: Alois Lee
comment: Wouldn't  work and now i can not get it to uninstall

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Dear user, what does not work? Uninstalling can easily be done using either the long hold on the icon or via the playstore. Sounds like you have some issues with your device. Feel free to send me an email and I can see if I can help you. info@vansteinengroentjes.nl

author: shawn mccool
comment: Love the app for quick lookups, and woulkd love to use the character creator, but the rest of the races need to be added to the list!

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Check also our content thread on complete-reference.com/forum/ You can import a lot of content including races from there.

author: Mitch Webb
comment: Not a full enough catalogue, missing a large number of playable races, I would dread to think what else is missing

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Check the additional content from our forums at complete-reference.com/forum/ . You can easily import the content from there, including races.

author: DevilsNipple
comment: All you need for simple lookups. DM tools are a godsend

author: Bryan Sherer
comment: It's pretty good

author: Matthew Nadeau
comment: Awsome resource.

author: Landon Snell
comment: Bought the character sheet. It's not nearly as good as the others out there, unfortunately. It allows for the wider database of classes and such, but doesn't show me nearly as much useful info as 'Fifth Edition Character Sheet' does. Kinda wish I'd have paid for that instead. I simply won't use what I bought here.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: I am sorry for your disappointment, the character sheet is made in such a way that it can be expended with content, instead of relying only on the basic classes. Unfortunately that does mean that not everything is automatically calculated. If you want send me your purchase receipt to info@vansteinengroentjes.nl and I can give you a refund.

author: Peyton Denisar
comment: I love this app, the only thing lacking is how behind it is on content. With new additions to the game being brought in Xanathar's Guide to everything I was really hoping I'd be able to find the new spells included. Besides the need for some of the more recent content to be added, a great app for DM and Player!

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Thank you for the review, check our forum regularly at complete-reference.com/forum/ . New content is being posted there.

author: Kevin Meyer
comment: Great app. But as others say, the character sheet is where this app falls short. I too think it's overly complicated for what's needed. Yes I understand the need for leaving things open for customization, but there's gotta be a better approach than making it appear more confusing. My biggest complaint though is the spell casting. I mean, wth is up with that screen? When i have 3 1st lvl spell slots, i should not be able to cast 3 burning hands AND 3 magic missles before i get stopped for using up my 3 slots. Cuz i really used up 6 slots. It should be collective, not separate. That is enough to push me to a different app for spells.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Dear user, I understand the confusion for spells. This feature to keep the spells you cast is very recent and we are still working out how to make this work for both wizards and sorceress type of spells. It now uses a wizard approach, where you prepare spells each day. This does of course not really work when you play a sorcerer.

author: Carl Bozeman
comment: A good reference but only as that the character manager is horribly built is not intituitive at all. Every free character manager I've found is more user friendly and displays more information

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback, we will see to improving the character manager.

author: Nathaniel Crispin
comment: Amazing resource and if it's not in it you can add it yourself. Found an issue with printing a card spell, developer wad very quick to responded and has fixed the error within the week.

author: Mickey Haugh
comment: I purchased the character manager and it won't even open. Every time I try the app crashes. How do I get a refund?

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Dear user, that is indeed not nice, we will try to solve this issue asap. You can ask for a refund by sending your google playstore receipt to info@vansteinengroentjes.nl . Sorry for this inconvenience.

author: Jonathon Krzykwa
comment: Great app. Use it all the time and recommend to everyone. Would like a slightly less complicated character manager but not what i bought it for anyways.

author: David Brown
comment: This is probaly the best of its kind. It has apl the base information from most of the books and a lot more. Definatly reccomend

author: Ikhomega
comment: Dope.

author: Alex Jones
comment: When are you guys adding more races like the 4 different types of Genasi or the Aarakocra. I paid for the character manager and none of my races are on the app. Kinda worried I just wasted my money on that portion of the app

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Dear user, you can easily download and import the extra races like Aarakocra from our forums at: complete-reference.com/forum/ . Let me know if you have any issues.

author: Alexandre Paquette
comment: Overall, I really like this app. It's very easy to look up almost anything for D&D 5e. However, I purchased the character manager and found myself quite disappointed. It is much more complicated than it needs to be and is essentially unusable while playing. It would be worth taking notes from the fifth edition character sheet as it is currently the app I'm using while playing.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Thank you for the review. We will continue to work on the character manager in making it more easy to use.

author: Jimmy James
comment: This is a great resource. It takes a little bit of effort to download (free) the extra stuff to make it more complete, but well worth it!

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Thank you for the nice review. Have fun playing!

author: Zach Jacob
comment: This app is incredible. I just started my first D&D game not long ago with some of my friends and I've tried several apps, but this one blows them all out of the water.  Well. Freaking. Done.

author: Chris Ronberg
comment: I'd like a better description of the DM tools upgrade. Is it a simple initiative tracker or does it also help track HP/Conditions? (Edit) Thanks for the response. I'll give it a shot.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: The DM tools come with a variety of random generators, an initiative plus hp tracker, campaign notes and places category and a view additional smaller features. Feel free to try it, you can always ask me for a refund if you don't like it.

author: Durelen Knight
comment: I use the character manager heavily and love it.  The only thing missing is a "notes" page for character specific game notes.

author: David Golding
comment: Simple races such as Drow (Dark Elves) not in the character manager (which you have to pay to use) very very Bad especially as you have to pay for that part.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback, the character manager uses all the content available in the app, which can be easily expanded. You can download a huge amount of content from our forums at https://complete-reference.com/forum/ . If you have any issues with importing the content let me know by mail info@vansteinengroentjes.nl

author: Rudy Sierra
comment: Been looking for an app like this i have like 4 others and this one was an all in one soo it a recommendation if you dont have any manuals

author: Timothy Knisely
comment: your missing monsters Cambion etc.

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content: Please have a look on our forums at complete-reference.com/forums/ . You can import a lot of additional content from there, including the monster you are looking for.

author: Jacob Jenkins
comment: Not a complete reference, it is missing everything outside of the first set of core books

reply.author: van Stein en Groentjes
reply.content:
Please check our forums at complete-reference.com/forum/ . You can download a lot of additional content from there. The app comes installed with only the SRD5 to give you the flexibility to add any source you want to use.
Hope that helps.
